EmailTemplate.name: Consultation Schedule Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Consultation Schedule Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for being a LegalZoom customer, and for using our Legal Plan. Our records indicate that you have requested a consultation, but that you have not yet scheduled a time and date for that consultation.
Please click on the link below to schedule your consultation:
https://www.legalzoom.com/LZWeb/Welcome/SignIn.aspx?TIMESTRING=&iProcess=
1. After logging in click on the Business Advantage/Legal Advantage tab, 2. Click on schedule appointment 3. Click on View Schedule (or Quick Call back if available) 4. Click the time and date desired 5. Confirm your appointment
All unscheduled consultations will be cancelled after 2 business days, and will have to be resubmitted.
Please feel free to contact me at 877.818.8787 (M-F, 6:00am-7:00pm PST) should you have any questions.
{!snippetVariable.bestregardstext}
{!snippetVariable.thelegalzoomteamline}
{!snippetVariable.asdphone} | {!snippetVariable.asdfax} | {!snippetVariable.lacemail} {!snippetVariable.lz_website} | {!snippetVariable.lz_address}
This is a service email related to your LegalZoom account. For more information about how LegalZoom uses your information, please see the Privacy Policy: http://www.legalzoom.com/privacy-policy-popup.html
LegalZoom provides access to independent attorneys and self-help services at your specific direction. We are not a law firm or a substitute for an attorney or law firm. Prices, features, terms and conditions are subject to change without notice. LegalZoom is located at 9900 Spectrum Drive, Austin, TX 78717.
Please add services@emails.legalzoom.com to your address book.
This email was sent to: {!Contact.Email}
